transcript:
Customer: Aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, woh abhi dusre
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Yah RD construction se baat kar rahe Mr. Yadav ji.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Vijay India Mart se bol raha hun, Vijay India Mart se baat kar raha hun, haan ji sir.
Customer: Sir ek cheez hai.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Sir maine aapko bola tha India Mart mein, haan ji, haan ji main Dhananjay Yadav bol raha hun.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Sir mera supplier ka kaam hai, theek hai na?
Executive: Aapka jo kaam hai, woh aapne jo hai road breaker machinery rental service ka JCB.
Customer: Service, service usko nahi, service matlab kya hota hai? Service matlab gaadi aapke paas mechanical kaam ke liye aata hai tab service usko bolte hain na sir?
Executive: Haan ji rental service ka kaam hai aapka.
Customer: Haan sir rental service nahi usko bol sakte hain, supplier bol sakte hain na sir?
Executive: Achha aap samjhaiye mere ko aap kya kehna chahte hain sir bataiye aap mere ko.
Customer: Mera sir rental service hum machine rent pe dete hain, theek hai na?
Executive: Haan machine rent pe dete hain, bilkul theek hai.
Customer: Jo jo provide karta hai usko kya service bolte hain ki supplier bolte hain?
Executive: Matlab koi buyer ho gaya na ek prakar ka buyer jo hoga jo bhi aap se service lena chahta hoga.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Supplier nahi nahi hum kya hai hum hum kya hue sir hum jab machine supplier hue aap to supplier hue aap.
Customer: To ye sir primary business type mein sole proprietor and other likha hua hai, isko sir supplier kijiye na sir. Sir service provider.
Executive: Achha ek thoda mujhe batao ek baar kahan pe profile mein?
Customer: Haan ji profile mein additional details mein aap jaoge na.
Executive: Ek second sir about us mein keh rahe ho about us mein.
Customer: About us mein nahi ab mere profile mein jaoge to primary details aur additional details mein aap jaoge to wahan pe likha hua hai GST mein jo additional business details aata hai wahan pe sab kuch aapko rahega kab se aap business start karte ho aapke information type ka rehta hai. Theek hai na?
Executive: Aap usi baat kar rahe the additional quantity details ki aap baat kar rahe ho sir.
Customer: Nahi ki nahi sir. Aap ek baar correct khol sakte ho kya?
Executive: Ek second sir ek second sir. Main aapka na account open kar lu pehle seller account aapka, theek hai? Haan ji sir. Maine aapka account open kar liya profile mein gaye aap, theek hai? Profile mein jaane ke baad ek aari hai primary detail aur ek aari hai additional detail aapki, theek hai? Okay okay ji okay ji. Ab batao mujhe kahan pe jaana hai? Ab dekhiye primary ke business type niche GST ke niche business type. Achha yahan pe aa raha hai service provider aa raha hai, hai na? Haan haan to service provider nahi hona chahiye wahan pe sir kaisa hona chahiye supplier provider aisa rehna chahiye. Aap ek kaam karo jo wahan pe option aa rahe hain na uske nahi mere ko option nahi aa rahe. Nahi sir mere paas option nahi aa raha hai. Achha jo GST mein aapka kya likha hua hai GST mein kya record hai GST ka jo teen page hota hai na aapke paas? Haan haan. Aap mere ko teen page wala GST bhej do aap ek baar mere ko. Ek minute just main GST mein dekh leta hun ji. Haan ji. Nahi to GST mein usse to kya hai aap to yahan pe apne se likhte ho na GST to theek hai. Sir nahi nahi wo GST mein likha hota hai agar wahan pe aap cancer pe jaoge to wahan pe bhi likha hua hai as per GST record. Ek minute ji ek minute ji. RD construction document. Okay certificate.
Customer: Nahi GST mein to aisa kuch nahi likha hua hai.
Executive: Likha hoga sir likha hoga. Total number. Details of additional place business legal name ye aur trade name ye. Theek hai? Dusra isme kya likha hua hai not required certificate required primary isme bhi kuch nahi likha hua hai joint nahi. Service type mein kya likha hua hai? Service type mein ek minute additional business.
Customer: Nahi mere paas GST certificate hai usme aisa kahin nahi likha hua hai ki GST service ka service ka hai.
Executive: Aap mere ko wo bhejiye ek baar aap mere ko apna. Aap mere ko whatsapp pe kuch ye bhejiye. Chalo line pe raho line pe raho line pe raho. Aap mujhe apna number batana whatsapp wala number. 91063 91063 30 30 348 34 8 8 Haan ji. Bheja maine aapko sir. Haan ji ek minute. Wo teen page wala bhejna teen page wala.
Executive: But additional business mein humne aapka retailer likha hua hai supplier of service likha hua hai aur wholesale business likha hua hai.
Customer: Nahi wo sir dekhiye mere ko sir ek minute. Main aapko de raha hun. Haan ji. Actually actually hum keh rahe hain ki humko kaam kyun nahi mil raha hai, theek hai na? Haan ji haan ji. Kaam nahi milne ka reason yahi dikh raha hai mere ko service koi nahi dekhta na sir supplier dekhta hai. Aur hum is cheez ko kai kai baar se hum discuss kar rahe hain aaj che mahine se lekin aaj tak koi India Mart wale pakde hi nahi baat ko ki kya dikkat aa rahi hai ki jo kaam inke sath nahi mil raha hai. GST certificate bhej diya aap. Last time to hum aisa ho gaya tha ki kam chhodne wale the India Mart ke sath mein. Business. Achha. Kyunki reason hamare sath reason ho gaya na aap agar keval trust mein jao ye jao wo jao lekin kaam to milna chahiye sir kaam hi nahi karoge to kahan se paisa aayega? Sahi baat hai. Vijay Agrawal. Aapke paas GSN code nahi hai aapke paas GSN code? GSN code kyun sir ye proprietor ye ye hai individual hai na sir? Achha. GST individual hai na sir? Isme dikh raha hai na aapko dikha likha hai na ispe sole proprietor ship hai. Hmm hmm hmm. GST se isko sir sudhar kijiye aap tabhi ja ke kaam aayega. Aap mujhe aap mujhe whatsapp karo ki aapko kya likhwana hai yahan pe aapko. Main aapko bol raha hun ye service provider service provider and jo likha hua hai supplier provider rehna chahiye sir yahan pe. Nahi aap to service provider ho na aap. Aap jaise kuch render pe de do to sahi likha hua hai aap service provider to aap aap kaun ho aap service provide karne wale ho na aap sir. Are sir theek hai wo ek second ek second ek second aapko na ek aur cheez ek aur bhejta hun ruko. Jaise koi manufacturing karta hai sir theek hai wo manufacturer likh deta hai koi wholesaler hota hai wo wholesaler likh deta hai. Koi trader wo trader likhta hai. To jo line word aap bata rahe ho na supplier service provider ye to kuch alag hi ho gaya. Ye dekho humne aapki jo detail dali hui hai ye dali hui hai aap service bhi provide karte ho aap retailer business bhi ho aur supplier of service bhi ho aur wholesaler business bhi ho sahi hai na ye sab cheeze ab? Ye supplier and service ye theek hai sir. Ye aap yahan pe bhi jo service likh rahe ho supplier and service ye kar sakte ho sir. Supplier of service likha hua hai humne wo bhi sahi hai na? Haan wo yahan pe ye sahi hai lekin aap agar mera search karte ho na profile sir ek minute aap JCB aur dusre kisi ka dekh lo sir dusre kisi rental ka hoga profile uska dekh lo sir wo aapko dikh jayega. Aap mere ko bhejo kisi aur ka bhej ke dikhao dekho mere ko whatsapp karo aap mere ko kisi aur ka ki kya likha hua hai. Aap kisi aur ka bhejo ki netro business mein kya likha hua hai unhone.
Customer: Dekho yahan pe main kai dekh raha hun yahan pe kya likh raha hai JCB rental service JCB rental service. To maine bhi dekha jaise Sonu crane service wala hai usne bhi aapne wahi likha hua hai service other leasing business supplier of service likha hua hai usne bhi apna. Supplier to hoga hi sir supplier to hoga hi aur sath mein likha hua hai work contract. Achha theek hai sir chalo main abhi kaisa likhta hun JCB supplier rental service ye to machine ka ho jayega fir to fir to wo ho jayega JCB supplier ka matlab ho gaya aap JCB mein deal karte ho machine mein aap. Nahi rental service supplier na sir. Haan nahi agar aap JCB machine likhoge to uska matlab machine ho jayega na. To sahi hai kya? Aap ek baar soch lo do char logo ka dekh lo ek baar netro business fir aap mujhe bata dena ek baar aap do 10 15 khol lo aap. Theek hai chalo main dekh leta hun sir. Theek hai aap 10 15 khol lo fir aap mujhe bata dena ek baar. Okay ji okay. Theek hai sir done theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to change business type to supplier.

- Not getting enough business through IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the business type in profile.

- Asked to share GST details for verification.

- Suggested to check other profiles for reference.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check other profiles.

- Customer will inform executive about changes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- business type, gst, profile, supplier, service
